original: Boda, Kopparb. 1., av kontr iprost Jacob Theodor B. o. Augusta Elisabet Lindell. G. 24 m. Ingeborg Setter-berg. Barn: Inga f. 25, fil. stud., Uppsala. — Stud:ex. i Falun 06, fil. mag. i Upps. 12. Provår 16. Vik. adj. i Skara 12 o. 13, e. lär. i Luleå 17, i Uddevalia 18-21, ord. ämneslär. i Skän-ninge 21, adj. v. samrealsk. i Nässjö fr. 31.
translated: Boda, Kopparberg, 1st district, son of parish priest Jacob Theodor B. and Augusta Elisabet Lindell. Married Ingeborg Setterberg in 1924. Children: Inga born in 1925, studied philosophy in Uppsala. Passed final exam in Falun in 1906, graduated with a degree in philosophy from Uppsala in 1912. Completed a probationary year in 1916. Temporary teacher in Skara in 1912 and 1913, permanent teacher in Luleå in 1917, in Uddevalla from 1918-1921, head teacher in Skänninge from 1921, and assistant teacher in a secondary school in Nässjö from 1931 onwards.
